Moses Armah 'Parker' bụ onye na-ahụ maka egwuregwu bọọlụ Ghana nke ọchụnta ego ma bụrụkwa onye nwe na onyeisi oche Medeama SC yana onye isi oche Mospacka Group nke ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere Medeama
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2010, onye ọchụnta ego ahụ mechara weghara Kessben FC maka ego a kọrọ na US$600,000 wee degharịa ya Medeama SC..
N'oge ntuli aka izugbe nke otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Ghana nke afọ 2019, Moses Armah nọchitere Medeama SC onye nnọchi anya wee tụnye votu n'aha klọb..

Ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Ghana kọrọ na ya na onye bụbu onye ọkpọ egwuregwu AC Milan Sulley Ali Muntari na-ese okwu n'oge Ghana'2014 FIFA World Cup mkpọsa na Brazil Ka ọ dị ugbu a, n'ajụjụ ọnụ 2016 ya na ụlọ ọrụ redio Ghana Happy FM Moses Armah kwuru na ya agbagharala Muntari maka ihe ahụ merenụ.E zigara Muntari n'isi ụtụtụ site na ogige Ghana yana Kevin-Prince Board n'ihi ihe ahụ merenụ
Onye bụbu onye nkuzi Ghana James Kwesi Appiah kpughere nkọwa gbasara ihe mere n'akwụkwọ ya akpọrọ Leaders Don't have to Yell

Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị Medeama na 2010 Moses Armah ejirila nwayọọ nwayọọ bulie ọkwa nke klọb ahụ ka ha nọchitere anya Ghana ugboro abụọ na asọmpi Confederation of African Football site n'ịgba bọọlụ na CAF Confederation Cup na 2014 na 2016.
O guzobekwara Wassaman FC nke a gbanwere aha ya na July 2013 ka ọ bụrụ Emmanuel Stars FC ma onye ụkọchukwu Naijiria TB Joshua zụrụ ya.
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2018, a kwanyeere Moses Armah ugwu na Canada maka enyemaka ya na mmepe bọọlụ na West Africa.
O duuru Medeama SC merie ndị dike Asante Kotoko iji merie Ghanaian FA Cup na 2015. Nke a na-esote ihe yiri nke ahụ e mere megide otu akụkụ Kotoko afọ abụọ gara aga.
